analysisEngineMetaData.name: POS Density Feature: 3d Person Verb
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
Calculates 3d person (singular and plural) verbs density of the text.
For Italian: Vip3 Vii3 Vis3 Vif3 Vcp3 Vci3 Vdp3 VAip3 VAii3 VAis3 VAif3 VAcp3 VAci3 VAdp3 VMip3 VMii3 VMis3 VMif3 VMcp3 VMci3 VMdp3
This feature is not available for: English, German.
Formula: 3dPersonVerbDensity = num3dPersonVerbs / numTokens
AAE dependency: SentenceAnnotator.xml TokenAnnotator.xml NTokenFeature.xml POSAnnotator.xml

configurationParameter.name: POSTypeIT
configurationParameter.description: https://github.com/aciapetti/opennlp-italian-models options: lexical pos: As, Ap, An, APs, APp, APn, SP, S, Ss, Sp, Sn, SW, SWs, SWp, SWn, B, BB, Vip, Vip3, Vii, Vii3, Vis, Vis3, Vif, Vif3, Vcp, Vcp3, Vci, Vci3, Vdp, Vdp3, Vg, Vp, Vf, Vm functional non-lexical pos conjunction CC, CS determiner DD, DE, DI, DQ, DR article RD, RI adjective As, Ap, An, APs, APp, APn noun SP, S, Ss, Sp, Sn, SW, SWs, SWp, SWn pronoun PC, PD, PE, PI, PP, PQ, PR WP$ adverb B, BB verb Vip, Vip3, Vii, Vii3, Vis, Vis3, Vif, Vif3, Vcp, Vcp3, Vci, Vci3, Vdp, Vdp3, Vg, Vp, Vf, Vm, VMip, VMip3, VMii, VMii3, VMis, VMis3, VMif, VMif3, VMcp, VMcp3, VMci, VMci3, VMdp, VMdp3, VMg, VMp, VMf, VMm ecc. space separated multiple types are also allowed, e.g. "Js S Vip3"

value.string: Vip3 Vii3 Vis3 Vif3 Vcp3 Vci3 Vdp3 VAip3 VAii3 VAis3 VAif3 VAcp3 VAci3 VAdp3 VMip3 VMii3 VMis3 VMif3 VMcp3 VMci3 VMdp3
